tool_description: Checks if an animal or E number is halal or haram.
name: Halal Food Checker
title: Halal Food Checker

api_list.name: Check Halal Animal
api_list.description: Endpoint to check if an animal is halal using a string.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://halal-food-checker.p.rapidapi.com/check-halal-animal/Dog"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halal-food-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://halal-food-checker.p.rapidapi.com/check-halal-animal/{animal}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halal-food-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Check Halal E Number
api_list.description: Endpoint to check if an E number is halal using a number.

headers = {

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://halal-food-checker.p.rapidapi.com/check-halal-number/{number}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halal-food-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }
